Posted By: marmaris74 (4/9/2012 8:28:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
HA! I love the idea of planeswalkers protecting themselves from ferocious monsters by summoning a crotchety old woman to stop them dead in their tracks by scolding them.  
  
"Now see here, [Gutwrencher Oni](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gutwrencher Oni)!" You are going to show some manners if you want to set foot in THIS house! So help me Serra, I will NOT have my evening prayers disrupted by singing blood. And close your mouth when you snarl, we don't need to see your sorry excuse for dental hygiene every time you get hungry."  
  
"Well I never! [Bringer of the Black Dawn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bringer of the Black Dawn), don't you DARE trample all over my new carpet! And stand up straight, your posture is an embarrassment to us all."  
  
"For shame, [Insatiable Souleater](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Insatiable Souleater)! You haven't even finished your last meal of devoured souls and you're already back for more? You take one more step toward me, and as Serra is my witness, I will KILL you with my bare hands! And comb your hair, you look like you just rolled out of bed."
posts.html:
HA! I love the idea of planeswalkers protecting themselves from ferocious monsters by summoning a crotchety old woman to stop them dead in their tracks by scolding them.

"Now see here, Gutwrencher Oni!" You are going to show some manners if you want to set foot in THIS house! So help me Serra, I will NOT have my evening prayers disrupted by singing blood. And close your mouth when you snarl, we don't need to see your sorry excuse for dental hygiene every time you get hungry."

"Well I never! Bringer of the Black Dawn, don't you DARE trample all over my new carpet! And stand up straight, your posture is an embarrassment to us all."

"For shame, Insatiable Souleater! You haven't even finished your last meal of devoured souls and you're already back for more? You take one more step toward me, and as Serra is my witness, I will KILL you with my bare hands! And comb your hair, you look like you just rolled out of bed."

posts.post_content: As long as you leave a plains untapped, Abbey Matron is a 1/6 blocker - big enough to keep the mighty [Eron the Relentless](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eron the Relentless) at bay! It lacks decent attack power, but with so many underpowered creatures in the set, this old lady can hold her own in combat.
